metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35995 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple improper array index validation vulnerabilities exist in thefstReaderIterBlocks2 tdelta functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A speciallycrafted .fst file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would needto open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the tdelta indexing when signal_lens is 1.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
